title.narrative: Promoting Conflict-Sensitive Socio-Economic Development and Better Local Governance in Northern Mali

description.narrative: Promoting Conflict-Sensitive Socio-Economic Development and Better Local Governance in Northern Mali

This six-month pilot project brings together four NGO partners including International Alert, and builds on their experience and expertise in order to address the particular challenges that Mali is facing at the outset of 2015, namely three pillars of post-conflict stability and development: reconciliation, economic recovery and governance.
